name: CROPPED (itch) (Shroudy Software)
description:
Also on STEAM! See our Steam page HERE

Looking to review? Send us an email at:
Shroudysoftware@gmail.com or
mike@shroudysoftware.com

Will you survive the night?

Cropped is a first-person action adventure analogue horror game where you'll be taken on a wild ride to get to safety.It was just supposed to be a trip for a school reunion.. until it quickly devolves..

Take on the roll of someone there at the wrong place... and the wrong time..


What's on the tape?
Fight to get your your partner back - or don't, the choice is up to you!
Features:
- Open world exploration
- Secrets and lore bringing you into the dark world of CROPPED
- horror-survival combat
- retro style analogue VHS combat
- replayability - did you make the right decision?
- Keyboard / Controller support
- 6+ Endings!

A dark mysterious past..
What's going on in this farm? Unravel the mysteries of what took place and do what is needed to survive!

MAC and LINUX ports will be out soon!


Want to support us?  - Support us on PATREON! :)
